metadata.name: digitally_here.png
metadata.description:
"Digitally Here" is a series that captures the essence of our modern world, where we are constantly connected through technology yet can feel so isolated and alone. But amidst the chaos, the subjects of each portrait maintain a serene expression, as if they have found a sense of inner peace in this ever-evolving world of technology. The soft illumination on their faces represents the possibility of finding beauty and connection amid the noise and solitude of digital existence.

Overall, "Digitally Here" invites viewers to contemplate their own digital footprints and the ways in which technology shapes our perceptions of ourselves and our relationships with others. It challenges us to find balance between the benefits of modern technology and the need for genuine human connection and meaningful relationships.
